articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Foreign Diplomats 
    Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the foreign economic and
commercial councilors' corps here on the occasion of his birthday.
 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were handed to an official concerned by Evelio Duenas Ponce, commercial councilor of the Cuban embassy who is doyen of the corps, on Monday.
